I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive.
My pets are a constant source of comfort and love.
i type one handed.
I'm active and enjoy the outdoors, but my schedule can be hectic.

participant_2.background:
I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
My heart is full of love for my family and friends.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

content.text: I'm great! I'm a nurse, and I love my job. I'm also a big basketball fan.
That's great to hear. I'm a big fan of video games and spending time with my dogs.
I'm not much of a gamer, but I love dogs! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a German shepherd.
Those are two of my favorite breeds! They're both so friendly and loving.
They are! I'm so glad I have them.
I'm sure they make your life a lot happier.
They do! They're always there for me, no matter what.
That's what dogs are for. They're the best companions a person could ask for.
I agree! I'm so glad I have them in my life.
I'm sure they're glad to have you in theirs too
